summary: In the town of Munster, children are going missing. According to one mother, it is the doing of bonne homme sept heure . . . the Bonesetter. Its up to two librarians, a cop and a single mother to stop him! He's coming. At seven o'clock
cast: Brett Kelly|Sherry Thurig|Anne-Marie Frigon|Mark Courneyea|Tara Rheaume|Josh Grace|Jodi Pittman|Beverley Brooks|Jody Haucke|Kyla Smith|Shann McGrail|Amanda Boniface|Steve Duncan|Rebecca Westwell|Lucia McRae|Rebeka Hall|Lloyd Kaufman|Lydia Klein|Jennifer Forbes|Hayden Emery|Arisa Cox|Wayne Westwell|Nix Cameron|Kody Hall|Ray Besharah|Ashley Elliott|Stephanie Lavergne|Michelle Mulligan|Sonia Myers|Thea Nikolic|Jodi Larratt|Mark Cayer
keywords: slasher|librarian|scene after end credits|low budget film|urban legend
title: The Bonesetter
